Convert decimal degrees to radians

Source: R/utils.R
deg_to_rad.Rd

Convert decimal degrees to radians

deg_to_rad(deg)

Arguments

deg

A vector of values, in decimal degrees, to convert to radians

Value

A vector of the same length in radians

See also

Other utilities: add_bbox_buffer(), calc_haversine_distance(), convert_distance(), get_bbox_centroid(), get_coord_bbox(), point_from_distance(), rad_to_deg()

Examples

deg_to_rad(360)

#> [1] 6.283185
rad_to_deg(deg_to_rad(360))

#> [1] 360
